thread.title: Microsoft will offer you up to $300 to trade-in your old computer for a new Windows 10 PC

title: Microsoft will offer you up to $300 to trade-in your old computer for a new Windows 10 PC
text:
Microsoft will offer you up to $300 to trade-in your old computer for a new Windows 10 PC 
Published By: WPCentral.com - Today 
Microsoft is currently running a promotion called Easy Trade Up that sees the company offer up to $300 for trading in old hardware. Should y...
